sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; declare var AOS: any; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { heroStats = [ { number: '7+', label: 'Years Experience', icon: 'fas fa-calendar-alt' }, { number: '50+', label: 'Projects Completed', icon: 'fas fa-project-diagram' }, { number: '15+', label: 'Technologies', icon: 'fas fa-cogs' }, { number: '100%', label: 'Client Satisfaction', icon: 'fas fa-star' } ]; services = [ { icon: 'fas fa-code', title: 'Frontend Development', description: 'Building scalable web applications with Angular, React, and modern JavaScript frameworks.', technologies: ['Angular', 'React', 'TypeScript', 'JavaScript'] }, { icon: 'fas fa-chart-line', title: 'Interactive Dashboards', description: 'Creating data visualization platforms and analytics dashboards for business insights.', technologies: ['D3.js', 'Chart.js', 'Angular Material', 'Bootstrap'] }, { icon: 'fas fa-mobile-alt', title: 'Responsive Design', description: 'Developing mobile-first, responsive applications that work seamlessly across all devices.', technologies: ['CSS3', 'SASS', 'Flexbox', 'CSS Grid'] }, { icon: 'fas fa-rocket', title: 'Performance Optimization', description: 'Optimizing application performance for exceptional speed and user experience.', technologies: ['Webpack', 'Angular CLI', 'PWA', 'Lazy Loading'] } ]; constructor(private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { setTimeout(() => { if (typeof AOS !== 'undefined') { AOS.refresh(); } }, 100); } navigateToContact(): void { this.router.navigate(['/contact']); } navigateToProjects(): void { this.router.navigate(['/projects']); } downloadResume(): void { console.log('Download resume functionality would be implemented here'); } }
Hello, I'm

Shainy V Poojari

Senior Frontend Engineer

Crafting high-performance web applications and interactive dashboards that drive business growth and enhance user experiences. With 7+ years of expertise in Angular, React, and TypeScript, I specialize in creating robust solutions that combine cutting-edge technology with exceptional user experiences.
